Summary: V shaped, black with a light at each point.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down hwy 26 going west bound after work around 7:45pm. i got close to my exit north plains\cornelius and i noticed this ball of light in the distance. at first i thought it was a helicopter which i see many times when i'm coming home at night. as i got closer i thought it might be a star, i wasn't sure. many times i see this ball of light and as i get closer i see it's a helicopter using search lights traffic reporting for the local news. i took the exit and continued to watch this ball of light as i waited for the stop light to change. as the light got closer it split into two lights parallel to each other. i continued to watch it and as it got closer the lights became three. i watched the lights and a v shaped object passed over the over pass, not large about the size of a large airplane. it was black and not triangular, like a v strip with a point of light at the tip and one on each tail. i drove down north plains road and stopped and watched it as it went toward portland and it just got smaller in the distance. i guess my question is, did anyone else see this? you can contact me but this is pretty much all i saw.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Forest Grove
There were no other sightings in Forest Grove on or around November 4th 2009
